subject: Hockey, Ice
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: After playing for 12 N.H.L. teams since his debut in October 1990, center Mike Sillinger says he hopes he will still be a member of the Islanders when the league’s trade deadline passes.
snippet: After playing for 12 N.H.L. teams since his debut in October 1990, center Mike Sillinger says he hopes he will still be a member of the Islanders when the league’s trade deadline passes.
